resources.string: Too many requests from the same client.
Server has been disconnected, e.g. because the app has crashed.
Requested language is not available to be used with the current recognizer.
Requested language is supported, but not available currently (e.g. not downloaded yet).
Both nickname and age need to be filled out to chat with AI therapist
User must be age 18 or older to chat with AI therapist
Please select a struggle/topic for the AI therapist

You\'re now a therapist for a client named %s. %s describe themselves struggling with \"%s\". %s is asking you \"%s\". If this is something you can answer with, give the patient some help and tips. Otherwise, state you\'re a therapist but are happy to help.:
Failed to load response due to %s
Recording audio with microphone is required for Speech-To-Text-Translation!

To use Therapy AI, you\'ll enter some basic information about yourself to give the therapist context. You can then start a chat session with our AI therapist (ChatGPT) to discuss any issues that are on your mind. The AI will ask you questions to help guide the conversation, and will provide responses based on machine learning algorithms.
Our app is an experiment to see how users feel talking to an AI about personal issues, and explore the ethical concerns about this type of service.

Please note that the AI\'s responses are not intended to be taken as professional advice. Using Therapy AI is completely optional and at your own risk. We assume no responsibility for any advice or guidance provided by the app. We hope that you find this app interesting and useful, and we welcome any feedback or suggestions you may have. Thank you for trying Therapy AI!
Please enter a message to send
Please enter a message to get started

This app utilizes the OKHttp library, which has been added to gradle. This library is developed by Square and is regarded to be secure, from my research. It supports https URLs and includes verification of the remote webserver with certificates and the privacy of data exchanged with strong ciphers. The gpt functionality was heavily inspired by https://github.com/TheoKanning/openai-java
